string.value: The Reason Why Chief Stan is Livid
It's been said that #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k greatly enjoys playing the guitar.
#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k needs help investigating the incident. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1500 Able to proceed to 'Searching for Clues' as next quest.

Th-th-this is the Stanlica's Guitar! Where did you get this? I know you're from Perion, but you seem alright. I don't know where you heard about my passion for this guitar, but you're a sharp one!\nHaha!\nSo, are you interested in my story?

I'll tell you why I'm angry.\n\nWhen I visited Perion awhile back, I received a traditional Statue of Perion as a gift of friendship. That was pretty common back then, since the two towns had built a very co-dependent and caring relationship. But the problem followed immediately after that.

On my way back to Henesys, I was attacked by a warrior from Perion and had my Statue stolen! What's the logic behind their custom? You give a present, then steal it back from the recipient? Can it get more incredibly offensive than that?\nFortunately, I was able to save myself from danger, yet I can't help but harbor these feelings against all things related to Perion.
Hmpf! Thought you'd be curious... Suit yourself.
I have another favor to ask of you, so come back and talk to me when you're ready.
